name: Dressup the stickman!
description:
It's a bad game about dressing up a stickfigure. It's my first one and I made it at like, August 31st.

It was first uploaded to Newgrounds, but it got blammed so I uploaded it to Gamejolt. Now it's on Itch.

(Disclaimer: Despite there being a Phil Eggtree jacket, I do not support Jonochrome. I very much enjoy his games but I do not like him, this was before he got exposed.)
